plugins.prepareCmd:
echo "<?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"utf-8\"?>
<Project>
    <PropertyGroup>
        <!-- Wersja semantyczna -->
        <Version>${nextRelease.version}</Version>
        
        <!-- Wersja informacyjna z hashiem commita -->
        <InformationalVersion>${nextRelease.version}+${process.env.GITHUB_SHA || 'local'}</InformationalVersion>
        
        <!-- Wersja assembly (xx.yy.0.0 format) -->
        <AssemblyVersion>${nextRelease.version.split('.')[0]}.${nextRelease.version.split('.')[1]}.0.0</AssemblyVersion>
        
        <!-- Pełna wersja pliku -->
        <FileVersion>${nextRelease.version}</FileVersion>
        
        <!-- Hash commita -->
        <SourceRevisionId>${process.env.GITHUB_SHA || 'local'}</SourceRevisionId>
        
        <!-- Data wydania -->
        <BuildDate>$( new Date().toISOString() )</BuildDate>
        
        <!-- Kanał wydania -->
        <ReleaseChannel>${process.env.GITHUB_REF_NAME === 'main' ? 'production' : 'development'}</ReleaseChannel>
    </PropertyGroup>
</Project>" > version.props && cat version.props

node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const version = '${nextRelease.version}'; const branch = process.env.GITHUB_REF_NAME || ''; if (branch !== 'main' && fs.existsSync('CHANGELOG.md')) { fs.copyFileSync('CHANGELOG.md', 'CHANGELOG-develop.md'); } const readmePath = 'README.md'; if (fs.existsSync(readmePath)) { let content = fs.readFileSync(readmePath, 'utf8'); const badgeRegex = /\[!Version\]\(.+?\)/; if (badgeRegex.test(content)) { const newBadge = `[!Version](https://img.shields.io/badge/version-${version}-blue)`; content = content.replace(badgeRegex, newBadge); } const versionRegex = /(Current version|Version):\s*(\d+\.\d+\.\d+(?:-[a-zA-Z0-9.]+)?)/g; if (versionRegex.test(content)) { content = content.replace(versionRegex, (match, prefix, oldVersion) => { return `${prefix}: ${version}`; }); } fs.writeFileSync(readmePath, content, 'utf8'); }"
